name: Burg_267
culture_notes: Island Creole dialect with Coastal Tongue loanwords
nightly beacon rites tied to fishing seasons
strong seamanship and superstitious navigation customs
constraints: ritual magic requires scarce imported reagents and local specialist labor
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
long-range mind-influence is banned and rare
notes: permanent population small; reliant on visiting supply ships
beacon ritual doubles as navigational aid and market catalyst
